title: Bug 101187: Localization key can't be blank when adding.
description: Bug 101187: Localization key can't be blank when adding. Description: If the key is left blank, the externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart.
OB: When the key is left blank, the externalized text is not displayed in the chart.
EB: In the properties file, if the key is left blank, it should still have a valid value. Expected result: The externalized text should be displayed in the chart title. Actual result: The text is not displayed.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Set externalized text in the chart title. 2. Leave the key blank and try to add it again.
